name: LRUMapTest
description: Unit tests for the LRUMap class, focusing on its LRU (Least Recently Used) eviction policy and internal state management.

nested_classes.name: MockLRUMapSubclass
nested_classes.description: A subclass of LRUMap used for testing the LRU removal behavior.

nested_classes.name: MockLRUMapSubclassBlocksRemove
nested_classes.description: A subclass of LRUMap that blocks the removal of LRU entries.

nested_classes.name: MockLRUMapSubclassFirstBlocksRemove
nested_classes.description: A subclass of LRUMap that blocks the removal of the first LRU entry.

nested_classes.name: SingleHashCode
nested_classes.description: A helper class used to ensure consistent hash codes for testing purposes.

test_cases.name: testAccessOrder
test_cases.description: Tests the access order of the LRUMap, ensuring that the most recently accessed elements are moved to the end of the order.

test_cases.name: testAccessOrder2
test_cases.description: Tests the access order of the LRUMap with a boolean parameter, ensuring that the most recently accessed elements are moved to the end of the order.

test_cases.name: testClone
test_cases.description: Tests the cloning functionality of the LRUMap, ensuring that the cloned map is a deep copy with the same elements.

test_cases.name: testCtors
test_cases.description: Tests the constructors of the LRUMap, ensuring that they throw exceptions for invalid parameters.

test_cases.name: testInternalState_Buckets
test_cases.description: Tests the internal state of the LRUMap, ensuring that the buckets and linked list are correctly managed.

test_cases.name: testInternalState_getEntry_int
test_cases.description: Tests the getEntry method of the LRUMap, ensuring that it returns the correct entry and handles out-of-bounds indices.

test_cases.name: testLRU
test_cases.description: Tests the LRU eviction policy of the LRUMap, ensuring that the least recently used elements are removed when the map is full.

test_cases.name: testRemoveLRU
test_cases.description: Tests the custom LRU removal behavior in the MockLRUMapSubclass, ensuring that the least recently used entry is correctly removed.

test_cases.name: testRemoveLRUBlocksRemove
test_cases.description: Tests the blocking of LRU removal in the MockLRUMapSubclassBlocksRemove, ensuring that no entries are removed.

test_cases.name: testRemoveLRUBlocksRemoveScan
test_cases.description: Tests the blocking of LRU removal with scanning in the MockLRUMapSubclassBlocksRemove, ensuring that no entries are removed.

test_cases.name: testRemoveLRUFirstBlocksRemove
test_cases.description: Tests the blocking of the first LRU removal in the MockLRUMapSubclassFirstBlocksRemove, ensuring that the first entry is not removed.

test_cases.name: testReset
test_cases.description: Tests the reset functionality of the ResettableIterator, ensuring that the iterator can be reset to its initial state.

test_cases.name: testSynchronizedRemoveFromEntrySet
test_cases.description: Tests the synchronized removal of entries from the entry set in a multi-threaded environment, ensuring thread safety.

test_cases.name: testSynchronizedRemoveFromKeySet
test_cases.description: Tests the synchronized removal of entries from the key set in a multi-threaded environment, ensuring thread safety.

test_cases.name: testSynchronizedRemoveFromMapIterator
test_cases.description: Tests the synchronized removal of entries using a map iterator in a multi-threaded environment, ensuring thread safety.

test_cases.name: testSynchronizedRemoveFromValues
test_cases.description: Tests the synchronized removal of entries from the values collection in a multi-threaded environment, ensuring thread safety.
